# Figure Options

Customize figure dimensions, captions, and alt text.

```{r}
#| fig-cap: "Stopping Distance vs Speed"
#| fig-alt: "Scatter plot showing positive correlation between speed and stopping distance."
#| fig-width: 6
#| fig-height: 4
#| echo: true

plot(cars, pch = 19, col = "darkgreen")
```
